message: Let's split fairly considering the inflation rates.
Your initial offer was a good starting point, but doesn't fully account for the rapid devaluation of my share.  Let's meet in the middle.
Considering the inflation, my share is worth more than yours. Let's compromise a bit more.
This is a difficult negotiation, as time is literally money for me. I'm willing to accept a slightly smaller share than last round to reach an agreement.
